meta_info.name: ACTOR
meta_info.description: Ancestor of all real-world types, including people and organisations. An actor is any real-world entity capable of taking on a role.

attributes.name: languages
attributes.description: Languages which can be used to communicate with this actor, in preferred order of use (if known, else order irrelevant).

attributes.name: roles
attributes.description: Identifiers of the Version container for each Role played by this Party.
